TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

span.span: Provides a menu system for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为取代的顶级容器。 is the top-level container that supersedes . 它还提供密钥的处理和多文档界面 (MDI) 功能。It also provides key handling and multiple document interface (MDI) features. 就功能而言，并连同工作，尽管它们派生自。Functionally, and work along with , although they are derived from . 以下各项专门用于两个无缝和在所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 这些信息可默认情况下在设计时控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - 控件表示窗体菜单结构的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 您可以添加对象添加到表示菜单结构中的各个菜单命令。You can add objects to the that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每个可以是你的应用程序的命令或其他子菜单项将父菜单。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了多文档界面 (MDI) 方案中。The following code example demonstrates a in a multiple-document interface (MDI) scenario. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/CS/Program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/VB/Program.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否支持溢出功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports overflow functionality.

value.span: 如果 支持溢出功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports overflow functionality; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 溢出功能菜单项移到下拉列表菜单时没有足够的空间来将它们显示在。The overflow feature moves menu items to a drop-down menu when there is not enough room to display them in a . 当您将设置属性设置为`true`，还必须通过设置启用的特定菜单项的溢出属性。When you set the property to `true`, you must also enable overflow for specific menu items by setting the property. 默认情况下，如果它们不能适应可用空间不显示菜单项。By default, menu items are not displayed if they cannot fit within the available space.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuActivate As EventHandler

summary.span: 用户使用键盘或鼠标访问菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user accesses the menu with the keyboard or mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按 ALT 键激活时或通常既不需要也不删除从当前具有焦点的控件的焦点。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果没有中承载的控件或下拉列表的，该控件在用户按 TAB 键时获得焦点。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 一般情况下， ， ， ，和的事件可能无法通过键盘激活时引发。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在这种情况下，使用和事件相反。In such cases, use the and events instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MenuStrip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#489)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#489)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuDeactivate As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the is deactivated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按 ALT 键激活时或通常既不需要也不删除从当前具有焦点的控件的焦点。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果没有中承载的控件或下拉列表的，该控件在用户按 TAB 键时获得焦点。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 一般情况下， ， ， ，和的事件可能无法通过键盘激活时引发。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在这种情况下，使用和事件相反。In such cases, use the and events instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MenuStrip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#490)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#490)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnMenuActivate(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnMenuActivate (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.
Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到方法通过进行筛选后的方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`函数中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考的文档位于 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序将变为活动状态时处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅位于 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文档参考http://msdn.microsoft.com/library若要了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 可以还可以在 MSDN Platform SDK （Core SDK 部分） 下载中包含的 windows.h 标头文件中找到实际的常量值。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方调用非托管的代码。

span.span: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的方法以处理它们不处理任何消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
